blur_detection.description: The receipt image is well-focused with clear, sharp text throughout the document.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action needed as text clarity is sufficient for OCR processing.

contrast_assessment.description: The receipt has good contrast between dark text and light background making all content easily readable.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: No adjustment needed as current contrast is suitable for data extraction.

glare_identification.description: No significant glare or reflective spots are visible on the receipt surface.
glare_identification.recommendation: Current lighting conditions are appropriate for document scanning.

water_stains.description: The receipt shows no signs of water damage, staining, or discoloration.
water_stains.recommendation: Continue maintaining document in dry conditions.

tears_or_folds.description: Minor creasing visible in the central area of the receipt but does not significantly impact text legibility.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: When capturing receipts, attempt to flatten document more thoroughly before scanning.

cut_off_detection.description: All receipt edges are properly captured with no cut-off content visible.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: Current framing is appropriate for complete document capture.

missing_sections.description: The receipt appears complete with header, line items, tax information, and total amounts all present.
missing_sections.recommendation: Continue using current capture technique to ensure complete document content.

obstructions.description: No fingers, shadows or other obstructions are present in the image frame.
obstructions.recommendation: Maintain current capture approach with clear field of view.
